review: I was very disappointed in this unit but in part that may have been due to my expectations which were not in keeping with the purpose of the Chromecast.  I was under the impression that what was on my computer screen could be seen on my television.  That is only true for streaming.  If you wanted to put a power point presentation or spreadsheet or other such info up for display to a group that is not what this unit is made for.  Good for streaming movies and UTUBE clips.Also, I kept loosing connection and my computer was within 3 foot of my router and television.  That was so frustrating I went and purchased a long HDMI cable which met all my needs and cost about the same.
author: Larry Amore

review: I love the idea of being able to stream from your device straight to your TV without the hassle of cables.
